body:
The linked post explains it better, but essentially, we’re slapping Ruqqus watermarks on creative content. Most reposters won’t steal the content if it has a watermark. In the off chance that they posted on another platform (cough) R*ddit (cough) more people will be aware of Ruqqus. I’m open to watermark suggestions and/or edits as well.

https://ruqqus.com/post/2azh

title: [Not a meme] Response to creative content being stolen from Ruqqus: Ruqqus watermarks

body:
Thank you @CrystalVulpine

I would say for the time being this is relevant to an extent as users are creating watermarks on meme templates to help spread Ruqqus and also protect what little OC we have here from being pointlessly reposted on Reddit.

I shall allow exception like these for the time being but I believe any further posts should be taken to +PoliticalCompass or +Ruqqus

Your efforts are appreciated  @Emerald41 and I apologize for any misunderstanding. I’ll clarify exceptions more appropriately next time. 

@CrystalVulpine I think discussion of the guild itself and other relevant matters should be fine from time to time.
body_html:
Thank you @CrystalVulpine

I would say for the time being this is relevant to an extent as users are creating watermarks on meme templates to help spread Ruqqus and also protect what little OC we have here from being pointlessly reposted on Reddit.

I shall allow exception like these for the time being but I believe any further posts should be taken to +PoliticalCompass or +Ruqqus

Your efforts are appreciated @Emerald41 and I apologize for any misunderstanding. I’ll clarify exceptions more appropriately next time.

@CrystalVulpine I think discussion of the guild itself and other relevant matters should be fine from time to time.

body:
I've never really approved of watermarks, it's all a bit 9gag, especially when it's not OC to begin with. If it's small and inoffensive it could help with traffic if nothing else.

The suggestions I've seen on here, whilst i wouldn't say they were bad are a bit in your face for my liking. A smaller one could add a bit of mystique.
body_html:
I've never really approved of watermarks, it's all a bit 9gag, especially when it's not OC to begin with. If it's small and inoffensive it could help with traffic if nothing else.

The suggestions I've seen on here, whilst i wouldn't say they were bad are a bit in your face for my liking. A smaller one could add a bit of mystique.
